name: Gray Town (hirohito_japa)
description:
The game was made for One Minute Game Jam 5 and produced in 4 days 

Everything is gray in gray town, they need colors, happiness and some joy to make life better. 

There is our super joy comes in. The hero who bring colors to the world with her weapon. 

Your objective is to bring color to more objects in the scene to make a world a better place for everyone. 

Controls :

WASD - Move 

Mouse - Look

Left Mouse - Shoot (while is aiming) 

Right Mouse - Aim

Left Shift - Sprint

Space Bar - Jump 

Ps: There are support for gamepad, but I didn't had time to test it 

Could you make a world a better place bring joy and colors to everyone?
